pages.text: Sinew is dropped by most large animals, and can be processed into $(thing)Sinew String$().$(br)$(br)The first step in processing sinew is placing it on the ground to dry. This takes 48 hours (two in-game days) and yields $(thing)Dried Sinew$().

Once sinew has dried, it can be pounded on an anvil to make $(thing)Pounded Sinew$(). $(br)$(br)If you do not yet have a metal anvil, you can also perform this operation on a $(l:tfc:getting_started/primitive_anvils)Primitive Anvil$().

Finally, the Pounded Sinew can be crafted into $(thing)Sinew String$().$(br)$(br)Among other things, Sinew String can be used as a $(l:tfc:bsa/tool_bindings)tool binding$() to give your stone tools the $(thing)Perfectly Forged!$() trait.
